m_descr: This module provides device event push notifications for the Habitat Android app.
l_logLevel: Select which global event types you want to push to Habitat.
h_logLevel: Note that checking any of these will override and disable ANY device-specific filters specified below.
h_dev_message: This static message will replace the event information message.
h_dev_matchValue: Send the message only if the device reports the following state.
h_dev_matchValueOperation: Select an operator that should be used to compare the device state with the value specified below.
h_dev_matchValueOperand: Enter a numeric value that should be compared to the device state. A notification is send if the comparison return true.
m_del_phone: Do you really want to delete this mobile device?
